    • calculateVAT

      public static double calculateVAT(double purchaseAmount)
      Calculate the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount, which is 12% of the purchase amount.
      Parameters:
      purchaseAmount - The total purchase amount.
      Returns:
      The VAT amount.

    • displayReceipt

      public static void displayReceipt(String fuelType, double pricePerLiter, double purchaseAmount, double vat)
      Display a receipt with purchase details, including fuel type, price per liter, purchase amount, VAT, and total amount.
      Parameters:
      fuelType - The type of fuel (unleaded, diesel, or premium).
      pricePerLiter - The price per liter.
      purchaseAmount - The total purchase amount.
      vat - The Value Added Tax (VAT) amount.
